page.title: 11COALMINING -A MINERS DAY
page.content: 5:30 He gets up and has his breakfast and leaves home at 6:00.My shift starts at 6:30 before I go down I have to change my clothes to put on my pit clothes which include my helmet,overalls,kneepads,belt,boots and gloves.Then I have to collect my tallies.I then proceed to the pit shaft,before entering the cage to go down I am searched for contraband which is cigarettes,matches,cigarette lighters which are not allowed down the pit.The tally is an important thing it lets people know who is down the pit.The round tally is handed to the onsetter for going down the pit.At the end of the shift the square tally is handed in for coming back up.Once down the pit we get on a train to go to our district of work.We then go back to the pit top.
